meta_title: Maintenance KPI Dashboard Template: From Excel to AI (2026 Guide)
meta_description: Download the ultimate maintenance KPI dashboard framework. Learn to track MTTR, MTBF, and OEE, and transform raw data into a budget-defending executive summary.
title: Building a Maintenance KPI Dashboard That Actually Drives Decisions (Not Just Data)

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Building a Maintenance KPI Dashboard That Actually Drives Decisions (Not Just Data)

image_prompt: A high-resolution, photorealistic wide shot of a modern industrial manufacturing facility control room. In the foreground, a diverse group of reliability engineers and maintenance managers (wearing hard hats, safety glasses, and reflective vests) are gathered around a large, futuristic holographic table display projecting 3D visualizations of factory machinery and floating data dashboards with graphs and "traffic light" status indicators. The background shows a glass wall looking out onto a busy factory floor with automated conveyors and robotic arms. The lighting is professional, with cool blue and warm amber tones emphasizing technology and industry. No text or words should be visible on the screens. The atmosphere is collaborative and focused.
